Lane Decorator and getAngle(PreviousLane, Current Lane)
Description:
We need to decorate the lane so we can extend a GUI functionality that returns the angle which a car must turn depending on the previous lane and current lane.

For example if previouslane moving direction is EAST and currentlane is SOUTH then the method should return 90

if previouslane is SOUTH and current is WEST, it should return 180.

And so on for all cases.

 

Lane l = new Lane(……...)

decoratedLane dl = new decorateLane(l)

dl.getAngle(previouslane,current) should return integer

Implementation & Evaluation: All GUIs for the Map, and Coordinates, MapGrid, Lanes, Roads, etc.
Description:
All model stuff like:

  • Coordinates (simple x, y pair)
  • MapGrid (2d array)
  • Component interface, how its used for Intersections and Roads
  • the Map class, and how it works with the MapGrid 
  • The roads, and how they  have a start and end coordinate
  • The lanes and how they have a start and end coordinate

And talk about the GUI:

  • How the GUI is drawn, each cell
  • With the LayoutGUI class, each decorator, etc.
  • Evolution of the vehicle movement (cars didnt turn, now they turn really well, how cars used to not stay in their lanes, didn’t work with the Ticker)
